pages.text: The Path of Lethality is the path of the killer. Dish out major damage, wield scepters that can be used like swords, even wither your opponents away.$(br2)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_lethality_routes)Routes on the Path of Lethality$(/l)

pages.mods: Possible unique modifiers: Lethal/Pact of Lethality, Corrupted, Blade Aspect
